title: Koushik Biswas - Quick Facts
text:
Koushik Biswas
Department | Metallurgical & Materials Engineering
Research Area(s) | Energy materials (Hydrogen storage - Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Lithium Ion Battery) Electroceramics (Ferroelectric - Pyroelectric - Relaxor - Multiferroics) Structural Ceramics (ZrO2 - Al2O3 - TBC - SiC) Ceramic Reinforced Metal Matrix Composites (steel and Al-based MMC with SiC - TiC-other Carbide) Sintering (Conventional - Microwave - SPS) Abinitio (DFT) and MD Modeling
Year Joined | 2007
email | [email protected]
